name: Recipe: Garlic Baguette
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Garlic Baguette.

value.text: Purchase from Louis in Court of Fontaine

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Butter
customize.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

customize.name: Garlic Baguette
customize.desc: Sliced baguette. Taken freshly out of the oven, the bread has a crispy, crackling crust, and soft, fluffy crumb. The aroma of butter and garlic further adds to the baguette's tastiness! No wonder you often see Fontainians buying a baguette on their way home after work.
